snippet: Hundreds of civilians also fled the coastal town of Barawe in fear they would be caught in crossfire as Somali and African Union troops approached.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of civilians also fled the coastal town of Barawe in fear they would be caught in crossfire as Somali and African Union troops approached.

headline.main: Shabab Fighters Pull Out of a Somali Stronghold as Government Troops Advance
headline.print_headline: Shabab Fighters Pull Out of a Somali Stronghold as Government Troops Advance
